title: 02/24/21 DPS Hour 3 Adam Sandler and Chris McDonald
itunes:title: 02/24/21 DPS Hour 3 Adam Sandler and Chris McDonald
description:
Adam Sandler and Chris McDonald talk to Dan about the success of thier movie Happy Gilmore. Adam and Chris both express their concerns and well wishes for Tiger Woods.
